title: Lila - An Inquiry into Morals - by Robert M Pirsig - Commentary on Chapter 3
description:
Pretty straightforward account of Phaedrus' Visionquest, but some important themes come up, including the essential dichotomy of the study

Pirsig interveiw re Lila: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k6IKu2wgm5I
Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies: https://maps.org/
Johns Hopkins Research: https://hopkinspsychedelic.org/
Pollan's book: https://michaelpollan.com/books/how-to-change-your-mind/
